message: I'm starting to use Etsy's StatsD to push more information into Graphite, and could use some ideas or recipes for defining useful graphs.
- list of typical stats for a functional area
- Descriptions of time periods, any functions applied to the metrics, etc
FWIW, one of the etsy guys, can't remember which, mentioned they are collecting 32,000 metrics with graphite.  :)
That was Mike Brittain. We have about half in graphite and half in ganglia :) Dashboards are *key* for us.
@steveivy any thing you've learned over the last few weeks?  I just opened the CLI today to start messing around with it...
so, now I can graph deploys + api.total.hits + api.404 + api.500
to see api activity compared to deploys
yeah, a bit: structure your stats so that you can group them
and api.400 as well as api.methodname.400
i added some code to a project today that adds stats for API hits, 404 and 500 errors
i have api.total.hits, as well as api.methodname.hits
Duly noted.  What about cli commands?  Found any hints techniques beyond the cli reference guide?  I *just* started poking around, so nothing of value from me yet
the CLI is mostly sucky in my experience. The URL hacking is the way to go :)
